sn10.3:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10.3:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.
sn10.3:4.3: Atha kho kharo yakkho sūcilomaṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
sn10.3:4.6: Yāva jānāmi yadi vā so samaṇo yadi vā pana so samaṇako”ti.
sn10.3:5.1: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn10.3:5.4: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10.3:5.9: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
sn10.3:5.10: “Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya;
sn10.3:5.11: api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadā kaṅkhasī”ti. ()
sn10.3:8.4: māluvāva vitatā vane.
